org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib
[Groovy] Class VaadinTagLib

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib.VaadinTagLib

class VaadinTagLib

Vaadin tags prefixed with "v", for example <v:label>

Tags provided:

  • layout
  • location
  • include
  • accordion
  • tabs
  • tab
  • horizontalLayout
  • verticalLayout
  • warning
  • error
  • table
  • column
  • form
  • field
  • checkBox
  • comboBox
  • date
  • listSelect
  • optionGroup
  • password
  • select
  • text
  • textArea
  • timeZoneSelect
  • localeSelect
  • currencySelect
  • file
  • customField
  • label
  • link
Also provided are helper methods for creating Components, intended to be called directly from GSP code rather than in a tag:
  • createAccordion
  • createInclude
  • createLayout
  • createLocation
  • createHorizontalLayout
  • createVerticalLayout
  • createTable
  • createTabs
  • createForm
  • createLabel
  • createLink
Finally, there are additional methods for special situations:
  • confirm
  • commit
Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Property Detail

accordion

Closure accordion
Vaadin Accordion tag

Tabs to be added to the Accordion should be specified as nested <v:tab> elements.

checkBox

Closure checkBox
CheckBox field

checkbox

Closure checkbox
CheckBox field

column

Closure column
Configuration tag for describing a column in a Vaadin Table

The column header should be specified as the body of the tag.

A column generator can be specified using the 'generator' attribute, which expects a Closure accepting an Item parameter. The item is the underlying data of a row in the table.

comboBox

Closure comboBox
ComboBox field

combobox

Closure combobox
ComboBox field

commit

Closure commit
Helper method that returns a closure that can be used in the 'onclick' attribute of a GrailsButton

Commits the specified form object.

attr:
form REQUIRED The form to commit

confirm

Closure confirm
Helper method that returns a closure that can be used in the 'onclick' attribute of a GrailsButton

Used to trigger a confirm yes/no popup window, e.g. before deleting a domain object.

attr:
message REQUIRED The confirmation message

attr:
icon The icon as a resource or path
attr:
onclick An closure expecting a 'dispatch' argument, used to manually trigger the link. Alternatively, simply return true from the closure to follow the link.

Constructor Detail

VaadinTagLib()

 
Method Detail

applyAttrsAndBodyToComponent

protected Component applyAttrsAndBodyToComponent(def attrs, def body, def component, Closure configurer = null, String bodyProperty = null, String configProperty = null)
Evaluates the tag body, which may return text and also may return configs from nested config tags.

If 'bodyProperty' is specified, the body text is added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

If 'configProperty' is specified, the configs are added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

Finally, the propertiesSetter Closure (or a default) is used to apply the 'attrs' map entries to the component.

Parameters:
attrs - The tag attributes to apply to the component
body - The tag body to evaluate, and add the results to the attrs map
bodyProperty - The key that will be used for storing the bodyText in the attrs map
configProperty - The key that will be used for storing the configs in the attrs map
configurer - The closure that will apply the resulting attrs map to the component
component - The component to which the attrs should be applied
Returns:
The same component, returned as a convenience

attachComponent

protected void attachComponent(Component component, Map attrs = null)
Attaches the component to the parent component in the current GspContext
Parameters:
component - The component to attach
attrs - Any additional attributes to pass to the attacher. E.g. may contain 'location'

attachConfig

protected void attachConfig(def attrs, def body, Class componentClass, String type, def bodyProperty = null)
Converts the tag attrs and body into a config object, and attaches this to the parent component in the current GspContext.

If 'bodyProperty' is specified, the body text is added to the 'attrs' map with that as the key.

Parameters:
attrs - The tag attributes to use for the config
body - The tag body to evaluate, and add the results to the attrs map
bodyProperty - The key that will be used for storing the bodyText in the attrs map
componentClass - The expected class of the parent component
type - The type name of this config

createConfirmPopup

protected def createConfirmPopup(Window window, String prompt, Closure onOK = null)
Creates a closure that can be used to open a popup window when a button is clicked.
arg:
prompt The prompt for the popup window
arg:
onOK The closure to run after the users clicks "OK"

fieldTag

protected void fieldTag(def attrs, def body)
Handles processing of all field-type tags.

lookupParentComponent

protected Component lookupParentComponent()
Finds the current Vaadin parent component.

removeAttachAttrs

protected Map removeAttachAttrs(Map attrs)
Removes entries from attrs map that are relevant to the attaching of the component to its parent, and should not be used to set properties on the component itself.

For example 'location' is only of interest to the parent component, as it specifies where in the parent component to attach this component.

Parameters:
attrs - The attrs map from which 'attaching'-type entries will be removed
Returns:
The map of 'attaching'-type entries that have been removed.
